title: SQL Database
description: SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving  data in databases.SQL stands for Structured Query Language SQL lets you access and manipulate databases.

title: NoSQL Database
description: NoSQL databases (aka not only SQL) are non-tabular databases and   store data differently than relational tables. NoSQL databases come  in a variety of types based on their data model.

title: Jwt & how it works
description: Authentication server verifies the credentials and issues a jwt signed using either a secret private key. User's Client uses the JWT to access protected resources by passing the JWT in HTTP  Authorization header.

title: JavaScript
description: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time  compiled programming language with first-class function.well-known as the dynamic language, support.While it is most well-known as the scripting language.

title: Node Js
description: Node.js is an open source server environment.Node.js allows you to  run JavaScript on the server, eliminates the waiting, runs single-threaded, non-blocking, asynchronous programming.

title: (Node) handle multiple req.
description: NodeJS receives multiple client requests and places them into  EventQueue & built with the concept of event-driven architecture.its own EventLoop which is an infinite loop that receives requests and  processes them.
